title: Kerry Katona flashes her taut stomach in a crop top as she takes daughter Molly to pantomime
text:
She's landed the role of wicked witch Carabosse, in Ilford's pantomime.

And Kerry Katona showed off her naughty side as she flashed her stomach in a crop top whilst heading to rehearsals with daughters Molly, 18, and Dylan-Jorge, five, on Wednesday.

The TV personality, 39, seemed in high spirits on the outing as she stopped up to fill up the car on their way to the theatre.

On the move: Kerry Katona flashed her stomach in a crop top whilst heading to rehearsals with daughters Molly, 18, and Dylan-Jorge, five, on Wednesday

Kerry showed off her taut stomach in a black cropped jumper that she teamed with skinny acid washed jeans.

Layering up in the cold, the mother-of-five donned a camouflage coat and black biker boots for the outing.

As Kerry nipped into the shops, her eldest daughter Molly could be seen flicking through her phone, whilst DJ chilled out in the back seat.

Keeping busy: As Kerry nipped into the shops, her eldest daughter Molly could be seen flicking through her phone, whilst DJ chilled out in the back seat

Kerry was seen leaving the shops with a bag full of goodies, no doubt to keep her children entertained as she rehearsed for her pantomime.

The former Atomic Kitten star has signed on to play wicked witch Carabosse in Kenneth More's Christmas panto production of Sleeping Beauty.

The singer is no stranger to treading the boards, but her last couple of productions have received mixed successes, with her Easter production of Beauty and the Beast and last Christmas' turn in Cinderella failing to pull in audiences.

Taking it easy: The TV personality, 39, seemed in high spirits on the outing as she stopped up to fill up the car on their way to the theatre

That's a wrap! Layering up in the cold, the mother-of-five donned a camouflage coat and black biker boots for the outing

Treats: Kerry was seen leaving the shops with a bag full of goodies, no doubt to keep her children entertained as she rehearsed for her pantomime

New role: The former Atomic Kitten star has signed on to play wicked witch Carabosse in Kenneth More's Christmas panto production of Sleeping Beauty

Hit and miss: The singer is no stranger to treading the boards, but her last couple of productions have received mixed successes

Kerry's return to the stage indicates she is on the mend after she was rushed to the nearest A&E ward after falling violently ill earlier this month with a mystery illness.

Following a three day stay and a battery of tests, she was no closer to establishing what prompted her symptoms.

Writing in her new! magazine column, Kerry – who has since been released from hospital – told fans: ‘Woe is me, I’m writing this from my hospital bed! I’ve been here for three days and the doctors still don’t know what’s wrong with me.

‘Initially I thought it was bad case of kidney stones because the pain was so hideous, but that’s been ruled out. I’ve had a CT scan, an MRI and suppositories stuck up my bum – all sorts!’

Feeling good: Kerry's return to the stage indicates she is on the mend after she was rushed to the nearest A&E ward after falling violently ill earlier this month with a mystery illness

Mystery: Following a three day hospital stay and a battery of tests, she was no closer to establishing what prompted her symptoms

Despite the dark cloud surrounding her illness, Kerry admitted there was a silver lining of sorts because it gave her a chance to temporarily relinquish her domestic responsibilities.

She added: ‘That said, I’m loving it a little bit – it’s a nice break from dealing with the kids and the housework! But just to reassure everyone, I’ll be alright. I’m not dying, I’m just in lot of pain.’

Kerry has daughters, Molly, 17, and Lilly-Sue, 16, with first husband Brian McFadden, Heidi, 12, and Maxwell, 11, with second spouse Mark Croft and Dylan-Jorge, five, with her late third husband George.
description: She's landed the role of wicked witch Carabosse, in Ilford's pantomime. And Kerry showed off her naughty side as she flashed her stomach in a crop top heading to rehearsals.
